```{r, include=FALSE, messages=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment="", cache=FALSE, fig.align="center")
library(tidyverse)
devtools::load_all(".")
```

We recommend the latest version of R (\>= 3.1.1)

Install the development version of the package from Github.
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("montilab/CaDrA")
```

Load the package into an R session.
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(CaDrA)
```
